analyzed: kena anusiṭṭhaḥ idha mā āgataḥ asi
yam āhuḥ na id tam purisena duccaja
maghavā ati naṃ āhu manussa loke
tena anusiṭṭhaḥ idha mā āgataḥ asmi
yam āhuḥ na id tam purisena duccaja
yat icchase tvam tat ate samijjhatu
yat hi yāce tat hi dade

original: yaṁ na yāce na taṁ dade;
analyzed: yam na yāce na tam dade

original: “Āyuṁ nu vaṇṇaṁ nu sukhaṁ balaṁ nu,
analyzed: āyum nu vaṇṇam nu sukham balam nu
na vā aham etam yasasā dadāmi

original: Na puttamicche na dhanaṁ na raṭṭhaṁ;
analyzed: na puttam icche na dhanam na raṭṭha
id ca iva dāne ramate manaḥ mama
sakhā ca mittaḥ ca mama asi sīvika
su sikkhitaḥ sādhu karohi me vacaḥ
kaḥ ni idha vittam na dadeyya yācitaḥ
na ca āgamattā param atthi kiñci
